title: How Do I Take a Singular Day Off in the Appointment Calendar?
body:
This article will cover how to take a singular day off in the appointment calendar.

Within the appointment calendar, click on New Appointment as if you are booking an appointment but select 'Unavailable' instead.
After this, set the Duration of the time or how long the day off will take, the Reason and Notes 

Once you click SAVE you will be unbookable for that day.
